title: The Simpsons Hit & Run
description:
PC-GAME....The Simpsons Hit & Run
Genre......action-adventure


Compressed .daa CD images created with PowerISO.


Quick Installation.

Extract The Simpsons Hit & Run.7z with 7-Zip or a app that supports .7z files
Mount images to virtual drive that support Compressed .daa images. (PowerISO) 
Open Hit & Run 1.daa and run setup.exe
Once installed replace the Simpsons.exe found in the installation folder with the one in the Crack folder.


Installation.
Extract The Simpsons Hit & Run.7z with 7-Zip or a app that supports .7z files
Burn to CD, install and replace the Simpsons.exe found in the installation folder with the one in the Crack folder.

Play and have fun.
